ing: 1 quart lime sherbet, or to taste
3 (2 liter) bottles lemon-lime soda (such as 7UpÂ®), or as needed
des: "This punch is a holiday favorite in my family. It is very easy and completely delicious. Happy drinking!"
ins: Place lime sherbet in a punch bowl; slowly pour 1 bottle of lemon-lime soda over sherbet and stir gently. Fill bowl with remaining soda as drinks run out.
